mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Dunham, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Spade Township, Sumerset Co., PA [Spade Township, Somerset County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Dunham, Samuel Patient Age: 26. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture metacarpal bone index fingure left hand. Location Wounded: Greenspring Run. Date Wounded: 1864/04/27. Nature of Wound: Musket Ball . Result: Cured and returned to duty Sept 29th 1864.
